name: Bimbo
description:
BIMBO NEEDS YOUR HELP TO GET A FRIEND, CAN YOU HELP HE? HISTORY

Bimbo is a yeti who lives in the mountains of South Harbor, a nature reserve where people go camping, fishing or hunting. However, our friend has been feeling very lonely and has decided that he will build a snowman for he. Your goal is to help Bimbo get all the resources needed to have his friend!

RESUME

This game has made for the 52º #minijam edition with the theme SUMMIT, and a few limitations (you can only use the WASD and ARROW keys) i tried to put in Bimbo all of my feelings, when Bimbo build her friend he catch the summit of he life.

Note: if you like the game, rate him and if you loved the game fell free to make a donation above :D
